Keyboard shortcuts for Microsoft Teams

A visual cheat-sheet for the 38 keyboard shortcuts found in Microsoft Teams

Original Reference Report Issue

General

Show keyboard shortcuts

  • Ctrl
  • .

Go to search

  • Ctrl
  • E

Show commands

  • Ctrl
  • /

Goto

  • Ctrl
  • G

Start new chat

  • Ctrl
  • N

Open settings

  • Ctrl
  • ,

Open help

  • F1

Close

  • Esc

Zoom in

  • Ctrl
  • =

Zoom out

  • Ctrl
  • -

Return to default zoom

  • Ctrl
  • 0

Navigation

Open activity

  • Ctrl
  • 1

Open chat

  • Ctrl
  • 2

Open teams

  • Ctrl
  • 3

Open calendar

  • Ctrl
  • 4

Open calls

  • Ctrl
  • 5

Open files

  • Ctrl
  • 6

Go to previous list item

  • Alt
  • Up

Go to next list item

  • Alt
  • Down

Move selected team up

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • Up

Move selected team down

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • Down

Go to the previous section

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • F6

Go to the next section

  • Ctrl
  • F6

Messaging

Go to compose box

  • Alt
  • Shift
  • C

Expand compose box

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • X

Send, in the expanded compose box

  • Ctrl
  • Enter

Attach a file

  • Ctrl
  • O

Start a new line

  • Shift
  • Enter

Reply to thread

  • Alt
  • Shift
  • R
